title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: We're scramblin fir the dosh but Jesus fuck, thaire's a cop car pullin up,n two polis git oot, so we're offski, oor poakits laden wi change. We kinhear them radioing fir help, and we head doon Madeira Street, nashinower Ferry Road, doon Largo Place, n the steps taewards the river, coinsswingin n jinglin. One copper's goat back intae the motor, but one stockycunt's fuckin well flyin eftir us as we hit the Water ay Leith walkway.
